name: A Very Flippin' Christmas
description:
Phoebe the tumbleweed has woken up, it's Christmas day in Tumbletown. Something awful is afoot, everyone's presents are missing! It's up to you to run, jump, and tumble around town to find all of the missing presents, and maybe collect some coins and smash some snowmen along the way.

A Controller is strongly recommended.

Press the D-Pad/WASD to Move

Press A/B/Cross/Circle/"K"/"L" to Jump

Press X/Y/Square/Triangle/"J"/"I" to Run or Interact

Press L/R/LB/RB/L1/R1/"Q"/"E"/"U"/"O" to Tumble
